links.title: Help
links.tooltip: PadoGrid GemFire Dashboards overview and help

options.content:
*Max represents the largest value of all replicated and local regions. 
Total represents a total value of all replicated and local regions.
Count represents a total number of all replicated and local regions. 
Excluding local regions, the total and Max ratio shows the amount of data that are redundant across each cluster.*

panels.title: All Replicated/Local Regions Rows Max/Total/Count Charts

panels.description: Number of region entries per cluster.
panels.title: Replicated/Local Regions: Entries

panels.description: Number of times a get on the cache did find a value already in local memory.

panels.description: Number of times a get on the cache did not find a value already in local memory.
panels.title: Replicated/Local Regions: Cache Misses

panels.description: Number of updates performed on the region.
panels.title: Replicated/Local Regions: Cache Updates

panels.description: Number of puts performed on the region.
panels.title: Replicated/Local Regions: Puts

panels.description: Number of gets performed on the region.
panels.title: Replicated/Local Regions: Gets
